review: Chromecast works as advertised, but beware there is no way I know of to use this with Amazon Prime unless you cast a Chrome browser tab, with all the attendant problems of resolution, sound synchronization and color temperature issues that come from casting a browser tab instead of using a native Chromecast app. I realize Amazon is trying to sell a competing product, but how much trouble would it really be to produce an Amazon Prime Video chromecast app, or a comparable priced product that would allow me to stream Prime?
author: Frank J. Taylor
